sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography , Button, Box} from '@mui/material'
import React from 'react'
import banner1 from '../assets/Untitled design.mp4';

const About = () => {
    return (
        <Grid container
            sx={{
                backgroundColor: 'linear-gradient(to left, #e0f7fa, #ffffff )',
                // backgroundColor:'green',
                display: 'flex',
                width:{md:'100%', sm:'100%'},
                height:'100%',
                padding:'50px  30px',
                mt:{xs:-1, sm:0, md:3}
            }}>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}padding={2}  >
                <Typography variant='h3' sx={{fontWeight:600, fontsise:'30px' ,mt:1, color:'#907394'}}>
                About Us
                </Typography>
             <Typography variant='body1' sx={{fontSize:'18px',  mt:4, textAlign:'justify'}}>
             Renowned for its dedication to educational quality Siddaganga Institute is a preeminent establishment committed to equipping students with information and abilities in a variety of subjects. It provides a dynamic learning environment with a history of high-quality instruction cutting-edge facilities and an emphasis on holistic development. By emphasizing innovation research and hands-on training the institute equips students to succeed in their chosen fields and become professionals who are ready for the workforce so promoting the growth and development of the country.
             </Typography>
             <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'left', mt: 2,}}>
    <Button variant='contained'>Know More</Button>
  </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6} sx={{ alignItems: 'right', height: '20%' }}>
  <video
    src={banner1} // Replace banner1 with the path to your video
    alt="banner1"
    controls // Optionally add controls for the video
    style={{
      width: '90%',
      height: { xs: '100%', md: '50%', sm: '100%' },
      borderRadius: '2%',
      boxShadow: '15px 15px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)', // Apply same shadow to video
      objectFit: 'cover', // Ensure the video covers the space without distortion
    }}
  />
</Grid>


        </Grid>
    )
}

export default About
